snippet: As the number of Orthodox Jews in Nevada continues to grow, a special Republican caucus has been organized for Saturday night, and is expected to draw a few hundred Sabbath observers.
abstract: Special Republican caucus in Nevada has been organized for Orthodox Jews, who are not permitted to vote on the Sabbath; move reflects how the community has been steadily growing over the past two decades.
lead_paragraph: As the number of Orthodox Jews in Nevada continues to grow, a special Republican caucus has been organized for Saturday night, and is expected to draw a few hundred Sabbath observers.

headline.main: In Las Vegas, Making Sure the Caucuses Accommodate
headline.print_headline: In Las Vegas, Making Sure The Caucuses Accommodate
